message.body: Nicole, its Sofie. I was listening to Cerens crit and heard you mention Sophie calle! I just wanted to say I met her at the Gardner this year. It was so cool she was doing interviews about the missing work. It was so awesome!!!! I thought you might appreciate it. Literally, after i saw her - which was a total surprise -I got back to the studio and no one knew who she was :(
I was so disappointed and starstruck.
Hey! Great now I have you cell! Hahaha that's awesome. I am obsessed with her! I would have been star struck too I have been inspired by her all though out my education over and over. She is amazing!
My favorite is exquisite pain! I wrote about it I'm my thesis! Lol
Yes! Me too. I wrote a paper on her years ago. I literally love art history. Nicole I'm glad you have my number now!
You'll have to tell me about it!
Me too! We should for sure grab a coffee or drink soon! Maybe next week one evening?
